entry.title: Type D quiver representation varieties, double Grassmannians, and symmetric varieties
entry.summary: Consider the following three families of varieties: (1) orbit closures in type $D$ quiver representation varieties, for the action of the base change group by conjugation; (2) $B$-orbit closures in double Grassmannians $Gr_a(k^n) \times Gr_b(k^n)$, where $B\leq GL(n)$ is a Borel subgroup acting diagonally; (3) $B$-orbit closures in symmetric varieties of the form $GL(n)/K$, where $K =GL(a)\times GL(b)$ and $n = a+b$. We construct nice embeddings of homogeneous fiber bundles over type $D$ representation varieties into symmetric varieties $GL(n)/K$. This completes a circle of links allowing translation of results about singularities of orbit closures, combinatorics of orbit closure containment, and torus equivariant $K$-theory between these three families.
entry.arxiv:comment: 33 pages. v2: expositional improvements throughout, and some technical corrections regarding homogeneous fiber bundles
